TextLibrary.Text: You cannot let this Minotaur escape, you must figt him again!
As you are exploring the Lair, you are ambushed by a Minotaur.
The Lair is still empty (with no sign of a struggle), but you find deep gouges in the earth nearby, as if some large object was dragged away.
Just outside the Lair you discover a cog from a finely crafted piece of machinery. This does not belong to any Dragon.
You find a number of Minotaur tracks leading up into the mountains. It seems the Minotaurs may be behind the Dragons' disappearance.
You see Flicker. He is being attacked by a large Minotaur. He looks like he needs some help.
Flicker joins you in order to track down the Minotaurs that have done this.
You must search all 3 Dragon Lairs again, looking for anything that might be a clue.
You must return back to the Dragonrealm and seek out Flicker.
